text: Eaba Re khethela Moshe masiu a mashome a mararo a le nots’i, Ra boela Ra mo phaella ka a leshome hape ho phethahatsa nako ea pallo ea Mong`a Hae eo kaofela e bileng masiu a mashome a mane; ebile moo Moshe a ileng a re ho moena’e: “Ak’u nts’oarela molepo har’a batho bana. U etse botle, empa u se ke be oa latela tsela ea ba fehlang mofere-fere”
